scripts.copy-files: copyfiles -f node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js public/assets/js && copyfiles -f node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.esm.js public/assets/js && copyfiles -f node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.js public/assets/js && copyfiles -f node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.rtl.css public/assets/css
